description: This source file implements functions to handle and map configuration parameters and status information related to GPON hardware components in a network device. It includes parsing, mapping, and updating data structures for physical media, GEM ports, VEIP interfaces, alarms, and GPON-specific metrics.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS gpon_hal_get_pm_index(char * ParamName,int * index)
methods.description: Extracts the physical media index from the parameter name string.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS gpon_hal_get_gem_index(char * ParamName,int * index)
methods.description: Extracts the GEM port index from the parameter name string, with conditional handling based on unification macro.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS gpon_hal_get_veip_index(char * ParamName,int * index)
methods.description: Extracts the VEIP interface index from the parameter name string.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS Map_hal_dml_alarm(DML_ALARM * pGponAlarm,char * ParamName,char * pValue)
methods.description: Maps alarm status from string values to internal enum flags based on parameter name.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS Map_hal_dml_pm(DML_PHY_MEDIA_LIST_T * gponPhyList,char * ParamName,char * pValue)
methods.description: Updates physical media data structures based on parameter name and string value, handling various physical attributes.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS Map_hal_dml_gtc(DML_GTC * gponGtc,char * ParamName,char * pValue)
methods.description: Maps GTC (G-PON Transmit Characteristic) metrics from string value to structure fields.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS Map_hal_dml_ploam(DML_PLOAM * gponPloam,char * ParamName,char * pValue)
methods.description: Maps PLOAM (Physical Layer OAM) message info from string value to structure fields.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS Map_hal_dml_omci(DML_OMCI * gponOmci,char * ParamName,char * pValue)
methods.description: Maps OMCI (Optical Network Terminal Management and Control Interface) message counters.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS Map_hal_dml_gem(DML_GEM_LIST_T * gponGemList,char * ParamName,char * pValue)
methods.description: Maps GEM port statistics and configuration from parameter name and string value to internal structures.

methods.name: void parseStrInput_InterDomainName(DML_VEIP * pVeip,char * pValue)
methods.description: Parses an inter-domain name string and updates corresponding fields, including VLAN tagging info.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS Map_hal_dml_veip(DML_VEIP_LIST_T * gponVeipList,char * ParamName,char * pValue)
methods.description: Maps VEIP interface configuration and status, including operational state and inter-domain name, from parameter name and value.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS Map_hal_dml_tr69(PDML_TR69 gponTr69,char * ParamName,char * pValue)
methods.description: Maps TR-069 remote management parameters such as URL and associated tag.

ctags.name: Map_hal_dml_alarm
ctags.pattern: /^ANSC_STATUS Map_hal_dml_alarm(DML_ALARM* pGponAlarm, char* ParamName, char* pValue)$/

ctags.name: Map_hal_dml_omci
ctags.pattern: /^ANSC_STATUS Map_hal_dml_omci(DML_OMCI* gponOmci, char* ParamName, char* pValue)$/

ctags.name: Map_hal_dml_ploam
ctags.pattern: /^ANSC_STATUS Map_hal_dml_ploam(DML_PLOAM* gponPloam, char* ParamName, char* pValue)$/

ctags.name: Map_hal_dml_pm
ctags.pattern: /^ANSC_STATUS Map_hal_dml_pm(DML_PHY_MEDIA_LIST_T* gponPhyList, char* ParamName, char* pValue)$/

ctags.name: Map_hal_dml_veip
ctags.pattern: /^ANSC_STATUS Map_hal_dml_veip(DML_VEIP_LIST_T* gponVeipList, char* ParamName, char* pValue)$/
